title: Seat Armour SA100HONB Officially Licenced Honda Black Car Seat Protector Towel
features: Superior quality, plush and soft for a comfortable feel.Fit Type: Vehicle Specific
Easily installed in seconds and removed in seconds, effortlessly folded and stored away
Perfect for pets, use under baby seats to prevent damage to seats, great to use after the beach, gym, or after yoga, running or tennis
Machine washable, durable; one size fits most
Seat towel may slip out of place after sitting so adjust accordingly, straps are not included on the bottom of towel due to potential airbag deployment issues
description: Seat Armour Car Seat Protector Towels are quickly becoming the essential automotive accessory that not only protects your car upholstery from damaging elements but also doubles as the ultimate car seat towel that can be used everywhere you go. This 100% cotton terry/ velour sear auto seat cover will fit over any car headrest and fit comfortably over the car seat, protecting your car seat upholstery from stains, dust and perspiration, helping you keep your car seats looking like brand-new. What's more? Seat Armour Car Seat Protector Towels come branded with your favorite logos. From NBA, NCAA, NFL, Automotive Brands, and the Armed Forces, you can choose from a wide range of your favorite logos to accessories your car seat. Also, Seat Armour Car Seat Protector Towels are specially designed keeping your cars safety features in mind. The automotive industry has seen fit to produce cars with various airbag deployment points. At Seat Armour we ensure that our product does not hinder or compromise your safety at the slightest. With no cumbersome pullovers or straps, Seat Armour Car Seat Protector Towels just slip over the headrest and grip tight at the base. In the unfortunate event of an airbag deployment, Seat Armour Car Seat Protector Towel will flex and move away, never constricting deployment. To ensure longevity of product, tuck into seat before sitting. A simple adjustment will ensure the towel will last a long time without any wear and tear.
